Description: Rim and body sherd of East Greek grey ware pottery shallow plate; upturned rim; dark grey fabric core sandwiched between buff margins, with mica and limestone inclusions; dark grey slip on exterior and interior. Drilled for analysis.
Curator's comments: The piece could perhaps be taken as a large lid.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GL.101)
